verses.name: Job 18:1
verses.text: Respondens autem Baldad Suhites, dixit :

verses.name: Job 18:2
verses.text: Usque ad quem finem verba jactabitis ?  intelligite prius, et sic loquamur.

verses.name: Job 18:3
verses.text: Quare reputati sumus ut jumenta,  et sorduimus coram vobis ?

verses.name: Job 18:4
verses.text: Qui perdis animam tuam in furore tuo,  numquid propter te derelinquetur terra,  et transferentur rupes de loco suo ?

verses.name: Job 18:5
verses.text: Nonne lux impii extinguetur,  nec splendebit flamma ignis ejus ?

verses.name: Job 18:6
verses.text: Lux obtenebrescet in tabernaculo illius,  et lucerna quæ super eum est extinguetur.

verses.name: Job 18:7
verses.text: Arctabuntur gressus virtutis ejus,  et præcipitabit eum consilium suum.

verses.name: Job 18:8
verses.text: Immisit enim in rete pedes suos,  et in maculis ejus ambulat.

verses.name: Job 18:9
verses.text: Tenebitur planta illius laqueo,  et exardescet contra eum sitis.

verses.name: Job 18:10
verses.text: Abscondita est in terra pedica ejus,  et decipula illius super semitam.

verses.name: Job 18:11
verses.text: Undique terrebunt eum formidines,  et involvent pedes ejus.

verses.name: Job 18:12
verses.text: Attenuetur fame robur ejus,  et inedia invadat costas illius.

verses.name: Job 18:13
verses.text: Devoret pulchritudinem cutis ejus ;  consumat brachia illius primogenita mors.

verses.name: Job 18:14
verses.text: Avellatur de tabernaculo suo fiducia ejus,  et calcet super eum, quasi rex, interitus.

verses.name: Job 18:15
verses.text: Habitent in tabernaculo illius socii ejus qui non est ;  aspergatur in tabernaculo ejus sulphur.

verses.name: Job 18:16
verses.text: Deorsum radices ejus siccentur :  sursum autem atteratur messis ejus.

verses.name: Job 18:17
verses.text: Memoria illius pereat de terra,  et non celebretur nomen ejus in plateis.

verses.name: Job 18:18
verses.text: Expellet eum de luce in tenebras,  et de orbe transferet eum.

verses.name: Job 18:19
verses.text: Non erit semen ejus, neque progenies in populo suo,  nec ullæ reliquiæ in regionibus ejus.

verses.name: Job 18:20
verses.text: In die ejus stupebunt novissimi,  et primos invadet horror.

verses.name: Job 18:21
verses.text: Hæc sunt ergo tabernacula iniqui,  et iste locus ejus qui ignorat Deum.
